Oh Canada!

August 21, 2013

checking in at the border office. instructions: just ride on over
here i go
smooth water damned by the locks and the rushing falls to the left
---------------------
grass lands and tree lined ridges
'First Nation' representing
'please let me use my cards'
snack before I go
urr, little nap then I'll go
cooking dinner in Bruce Mines
Pushing On
